Purpose: Detection and quantification of antibodies (e.g., anti-HMGCR, anti-SRP) associated with necrotizing myopathy to aid in diagnosis and patient management.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: Autoimmune-specific immunoassay analyzer/ELISA reader, calibrated pipettes, vortex mixer, microplate washer
